definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: Even now, at long intervals, his cartoons were appearing in The Times.
sentences.chinese: 甚至現在，他的漫畫還會偶而登到《泰晤士報》上。

sentences.english: I only see my ex-wife now and again.
sentences.chinese: 我僅偶而與我的前妻見面。

sentences.english: There was not a sound save that from time to time a bird called.
sentences.chinese: 除了偶而有鳥叫聲外，一點聲音也沒有。

sentences.english: So, the children are even and " digression " should understand , give tolerantly .
sentences.chinese: 所以，孩子們的偶而“閒話”應該理解，予以寬容。

sentences.english: I lodge at my good friend that at times.
sentences.chinese: 我偶而會借宿在我好朋友那。

sentences.english: Mr. B has recently come across some rare books at a flea market.
sentences.chinese: 先生最近在跳蚤市場偶而找到幾本罕見的書。

sentences.english: Don't forget to come in my blog sometimes when you free.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了偶而也來我的博客灌灌水。

definition: from time to time/now and then/occasionally/frequently
to take some time out/to make use of a spare moment
in groups of three or four (idiom)
in a whisper/in a low voice (idiom)
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
